Method Detail

internalLinkDetected

boolean internalLinkDetected(java.lang.String url)
Invoked when an internal link is detected. An internal link is considered to be a link that has the same host as the URL that the user specified to be explored.

Parameters:
url - the url
Returns:
boolean whether the link should be processed

outsideLinkDetected

boolean outsideLinkDetected(java.lang.String url)
Invoked when an outside link is detected. An outisde link is considered to be a link that does not have the same host as the URL that the user specified to be explored.

Parameters:
url - the url
Returns:
boolean whether the link should be processed

nonUrlLinkDetected

boolean nonUrlLinkDetected(java.lang.String url)
Invoked when other link is detected. Other link is considered to be a link that does not link to another page, and could be a location of a resource or mailto link for example.

Parameters:
url - the url
Returns:
boolean whether the link should be processed

saveLoadedPage

void saveLoadedPage(HTTP page)
Save a loaded page

Parameters:
page -

completePage

void completePage(HTTP page,
                  boolean error)
Called to request that a page be processed. This page was just downloaded by the spider. Process a loaded page

Parameters:
page - page
error - whether an error occured

stripQuery

boolean stripQuery()
Returns:
true - whether queuries should be stripped

voyagerDone

void voyagerDone()
When the voyager is finished
